select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from maintain_order
order by ${orderByClause}

update maintain_order
serialNo = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
